Submodules¶

MasterCSS.cli module¶

cli.py contains project environment setup, flask configuration as well as database initialisation.

MasterCSS.cli.load_user(id)¶

Load user detail

Parameters

id (int) – User’s identity number

Returns

User information

Return type

User

MasterCSS.cli.main()¶

Start Flask app and MQTT Subscriber

MasterCSS.cli.start_flask()¶

Start Flask app on env HOST, PORT

MasterCSS.cli.start_mqtt()¶

Start MQTT subscriber with Flask app context
